results.title: Better microvascular function on long-term treatment with lisinopril than with nifedipine in renal transplant recipients.
results.text_hl: Better microvascular @<m>DISEASE_Conversion_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003291 @@@function@@@ on long-term treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ than with @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@ in renal transplant recipients.

citations.NLM: Asberg A, Midtvedt K, Vassbotn T, Hartmann A. Better microvascular function on long-term treatment with lisinopril than with nifedipine in renal transplant recipients. Nephrol Dial Transplant. 2001 Jul;16(7):1465-70. PMID: 11427642

results.title: Short- and long-acting angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors: a randomized trial of lisinopril versus captopril in the treatment of congestive heart failure. The Multicenter Lisinopril-Captopril Congestive Heart Failure Study Group.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@, but not @CHEMICAL_Captopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002216 @@@captopril@@@, increased left ventricular ejection fraction in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with moderately to severely (less than 35%) @<m>DISEASE_Conversion_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003291 @@@decreased function@@@ (p less than 0.05).

citations.NLM: Giles TD, Katz R, Sullivan JM, Wolfson P, Haugland M, Kirlin P, Powers E, Rich S, Hackshaw B, Chiaramida A.
